definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: Many tapes don't have standard pronounciation.
sentences.chinese: 很多录音带上的发音不标准。

sentences.english: If you are using a brush for painting , the kind of masking tape that you choose can be important.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是用油漆刷，那种录音带，您可以掩蔽重要。

sentences.english: 'The human sound-track' he nicknamed her in his own mind.
sentences.chinese: 在心里他给她个绰号，就叫“人体录音带”。

sentences.english: Push it and the deck calibrates specifically for the blank tape you have just inserted.
sentences.chinese: 明确地为你仅仅有插入的空白音带推动它和甲板校正。

sentences.english: Through CDs and audiotapes, brainwave technology will make use of tools that will help condition your brainwaves.
sentences.chinese: 通过CD和录音带，脑电波科技会调制你的脑电波。

sentences.english: He asked the bones to give him a Hou Lianhai tapes and zhen-qing wang talk.
sentences.chinese: 他要求鱼刺给他一份侯连海和王振清谈话录音带。

sentences.english: We also have everything available on cassette.
sentences.chinese: 我们也有盒式录音带出借。

sentences.english: She expunged the sound of his voice from the tape recording.
sentences.chinese: 她从录音带上抹去了他的说话声。

sentences.english: Try to pronounce everything just like the eaker on the tape.
sentences.chinese: 尽力像录音带上说网游视频话的人一样发音。

sentences.english: "SOT" stands for sound on tape or sound bites.
Moreover, it would be used to replace the cassette tape of the next generation as a recordable model personal sound system.
sentences.chinese: 它是能替代盒式录音带的下一代可录式个人音响系统。

sentences.english: In his latest audio tape, bin Laden is talking about global warming.
sentences.chinese: 在他最新的录音带中，拉登在谈论全球变暖问题。

sentences.english: Did you want to listen to CD's or cassettes or the radio?
sentences.chinese: 你想要听光盘或是录音带或是收音机？

sentences.english: You will have to edit that tape — it's too long.
sentences.chinese: 那盘录音带太长，你得把它剪辑一下。

sentences.english: A transcript of the tapes was presented as evidence in court.
sentences.chinese: 一份录音带的文字本作为证据被呈交法庭。

sentences.english: I forgot to bring you the tape.
sentences.chinese: 我忘记给你带录音带了。

definition: pitch of voice (high or low)/pitch (of a musical note)/tone
tone sandhi/modified tone/(music) to change key/modulation
final sound of a syllable/rhyme (e.g. in European languages)
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
tone/note/a tone (on a Chinese syllable)/CL:個|个[ge4]
